title: Considerations for Securing a New Work of Art

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the most important considerations facing the person responsible for securing a new work of art or an artifact for a museum.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the most important considerations facing the person responsible for securing a new work of art or an artifact for a museum.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
